General.Name: Guangdong VTR Bio-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong VTR Bio-Tech Co., Ltd., researches, develops, produces, sells, and services biological enzyme preparations, biosynthetics, and nutrition and health products in China. It also provides biotechnology solutions. The company provides feed enzymes, enzymes for washing, food, energy, textiles, and papermaking; raw material enzymes, enzymes for livestock and poultry, aquatic enzyme, and ruminant enzymes. In addition, it offers active natural products; antibody replacement products for feed, feed livestock and poultry, aquatic, ruminant, and pet products. The company also exports its products. Guangdong VTR Bio-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

6.Name: Mr. Hong Fang  Du
6.Title: VP and Director of R&D Center
